examples.example: 生活中充满着各种小确幸，让我们时刻都能感受到喜乐。

translate.english: Life is filled with all kinds of small blessings, enabling us to feel joy and happiness all the time.

examples.example: 每天保持乐观的心态，便能收获更多的喜乐。

translate.english: Keep an optimistic attitude every day, and you will be able to gain more joy.

examples.example: 和家人在一起的时光总是充满了喜乐。

translate.english: The time spent with family is always filled with joy and happiness.
